name: Elympics
description: Elympics is a multichain entertainment layer, bridging brands & IPs to Play2Win mini-games across superapps and social platforms. Fuelled by $ELP used for gameplay verification, staking, and network operations, accruing value from all ecosystem games and driving demand with locking, buybacks and reward campaigns from games & IP’s to $ELP stakers. Current games/IP’s pipeline include: Pudgy Penguins, Doodles, Flappy Bird, Crypto Banter and much more. One of the flagship games built on Elympics is the first Telegram mini-game from Pudgy Penguins called Pengu Clash that reached 2M+ people on its waitlist.
